code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Button}from'./ui/button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookList=_ref=>{let{onSelectBook}=_ref;const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBooks=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/api/alkitab/kitab');if(!response.ok)throw new Error('Gagal memuat kitab');const data=await response.json();console.log('Books dari API:',data);setBooks(data);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchBooks();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300",children:"Memuat daftar kitab..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center text-red-500",children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-2 sm:grid-cols-3 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 p-4",children:books===null||books===void 0?void 0:books.map((book,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{onClick:()=>onSelectBook(book),className:"w-full",variant:"secondary",children:["Kitab ",book]},index))});};export default BookList;
